item.title: Beocord 5000 (4715/4716): Test Drive
item.description:
It’s a great day! My second Beocord 5000 (specifically models 4715/4716) is functional again and playing in sync with the rest of my setup: the Beomaster 6000 4-Channel and the Beogram 4002. To mark this occasion, I chose Sonny Rollins’ “Alfie” for the first recording. The movie “Alfie,” starring Michael Caine, is a personal favorite, and its soundtrack is incredible. Here are some snapshots from the listening session:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-5000-47154716-test-drive/

item.title: Beomaster 8000: Updating the Displays - Completed
item.description:
I successfully replaced a set of Beomaster 8000 display LEDs with SMD LEDs today. This set was in dire need of repair due to numerous malfunctioning display segments. Initially, I attempted to use my SMD work station for this task, hoping to refine the method I used for the Beocord 9000 display restoration, which had worked well. However, the SMD work station technique proved less effective this time, requiring more rework and resulting in wasted SMD LEDs...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/-beomaster-8000-updating-the-displays-completed/
